Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, worn, the interior is spotted with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394921) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394921)
